915640.name: Deathless Heroes
915640.description:
Unique mix of Collectible Card Game and Turn based RPG

Enter into the multidimensional world of fantasy, scifi and historic creatures and events. Collect cards, build deck with best tactic and dominate the Deathless World. Expect more than another card game. You choose guaranteed cards to start with! You choose which colors you want to increase. Cards contain many abilities and open up endless possibilities for combinations. The hero has abilities that he can use as often as you want. Choose cards that you can use repeatedly! And many other strategic elements that raise the game to the next level.

Base faction for now is Kingdom, Necorgen, Pagans and Inferno. Prepare for Barbarians, Warlock, Aquatar, Orphans and many expansions!

Early access and final release

Game is in early access and is often and frequently updated. 

Collect cards from many sources. Build your deck and play in online matches. More skills, less luck. Or explore the fantasy worlds in single player campaings.

Cosmetics like card painting variants, foils, sleeves, etc. Customize playmat, hero piece, banner, portrait and many more.

FANTASY AND HISTORICAL

Dive into the fantasy and real event, locations and meet with many characters, creatures, buildings, items, magic.
